title: SecurityPolicy
description: A named, prioritized security policy containing ordered evaluation rules that determine access control decisions for targeted resources or operations. Policies are evaluated in priority order with the highest-priority matching policy determining the outcome. Implements NIST SP 800-53 AC-1 policy requirements.

target.description: The category of entity this policy governs, aligned with XACML target element semantics.

requirementLevel.description: Compliance obligation of this policy, indicating whether enforcement is required by regulation, recommended best practice, or situationally applicable.
